cookies.title: Wedding Cookies
cookies.description: Made with a blend of gluten-free flours (including non-GMO/organic corn) for you to take home to finish with your choice of toppings.

cookies.title: Seeded Gluten Free Loaf
cookies.description: Contains non-GMO CORN starch. Made in a kitchen that uses wheat flour.

cookies.title: Cinnamon Raisin Bread
cookies.description: Honey White bread filled with cinnamon and raisins. Dairy free.

cookies.title: Whole Wheat Bread
cookies.description: A blend of whole-wheat flours for a wholesome, wholegrain taste.

cookies.title: Spelt-Oat Bread
cookies.description: Sprouted Spelt mixed with oat, and white flours, with a touch of raw honey.

cookies.title: Honey White Bread
cookies.description: White bread made with a blend of flours, including a heritage whole grain, and Kamut. Local raw honey gives the crumb a lovely soft texture.

cookies.title: Whole Grain Harvest Bread
cookies.description: Multi grains, whole grains, and seeds. Made with whole wheat, heritage, rye, Kamut, and white flours, blended with a mix of toasted whole grains, and seeds (chia, flax, and sesame). Full of flavor.
